attributes.action: For banks to reduce morgage rate in line with base rate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The banks have increased the morgage rates and this is to increase.
I can not remorage at a rate I had in 2005 of 4.25%.
The rate currently of .05% is not being refelcted in backs reducing morgage rates. To enable not only first time buyers but also others like myself who are looking to remorgage following the end of fixed rate morgage.
The government should not only be looking at supporting busineses but morgage payers aswell.
